mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zhuanjia_id as zhuanjiaId ,a.huanzhe_id as huanzheId ,a.zhuanjia_liuyan_text as zhuanjiaLiuyanText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,huanzhe.huanzhe_name as huanzheName ,huanzhe.huanzhe_phone as huanzhePhone ,huanzhe.huanzhe_id_number as huanzheIdNumber ,huanzhe.huanzhe_photo as huanzhePhoto ,huanzhe.huanzhe_email as huanzheEmail ,huanzhe.new_money as newMoney ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_name as zhuanjiaName ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_phone as zhuanjiaPhone ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_id_number as zhuanjiaIdNumber ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_photo as zhuanjiaPhoto ,zhuanjia.keshi_types as keshiTypes ,zhuanjia.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,zhuanjia.guahao_money as guahaoMoney ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_email as zhuanjiaEmail ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_content as zhuanjiaContent ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_delete as zhuanjiaDelete
FROM zhuanjia_liuyan a left JOIN huanzhe huanzhe ON a.huanzhe_id = huanzhe.id left JOIN zhuanjia zhuanjia ON a.zhuanjia_id = zhuanjia.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.zhuanjia_id = #{params.zhuanjiaId} )
and ( a.huanzhe_id = #{params.huanzheId} )
and a.zhuanjia_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.huanzhe_id IS NOT NULL
and huanzhe.huanzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheName},'%')
and huanzhe.huanzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzhePhone},'%')
and huanzhe.huanzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheIdNumber},'%')
and huanzhe.huanzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheEmail},'%')
and huanzhe.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and huanzhe.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and a.zhuanjia_id IS NOT NULL
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaName},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaPhone},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaIdNumber},'%')
and zhuanjia.keshi_types = #{params.keshiTypes}
and zhuanjia.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and zhuanjia.guahao_money >= #{params.guahaoMoneyStart}
and zhuanjia.guahao_money <= #{params.guahaoMoneyEnd}
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaEmail},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaContent},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_delete >= #{params.zhuanjiaDeleteStart}
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_delete <= #{params.zhuanjiaDeleteEnd}
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_delete = #{params.zhuanjiaDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zhuanjia.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zhuanjia.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
